name: Pong of Gods
description:
2 Gods decided to play pong, but they use 2 planets with civilizations on them as balls, trying to destroy each other's planet. Influence the civilization on your planet to build massive (but actually tiny) planetary thrusterers, or encourage a space program, and launch missiles at that other, puny world!

Made in 48 hours by Ian Chapman for Ludem Dare 38 Compo.
